title: The Best Of Italo Disco (Vol 11 - 13)
description:
The Best of Italo Disco Vol.11-13 (APE)
-------------------------------------------------------------------
This is not my rip. Thanks to the original up-r.! This is vinyl rip
which was put onto CD, and ripped to APE. The Sound is good. 
Volume 12 ripped as image&cue, the others was splitted into the single tracks. Logs provided. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------
